1000013702.title: Ferrari Ki Sawaari
1000013702.description: To fulfil the dream of watching his son play at Lord's stadium, Rusy is willing to go to any extent, even if it means stealing Sachin Tendulkar's Ferrari.

1000058432.title: Dhoni
1000058432.description: Young Karthik dreams of becoming a wicketkeeper and batsman like Dhoni. However, his adamant father has other plans for him.

1000058496.title: Saivam
1000058496.description: Kathiresan's family decides to sacrifice a rooster to evade bad luck. However, the rooster disappears, ensuing chaos and panic.

1000070415.title: Kaaka Muttai
1000070415.description: The opening of a new pizza shop in the neighbourhood has two young brothers, living in a slum, yearning for a slice of pizza.

1000182054.title: Hanuman Daâ€™Damdaar
1000182054.description: To prove that he is a brave boy, Maruti, a young boy sets out on a jungle adventure and transforms into India's original superhero, Hanuman.

1000192025.title: Little Krishna - The Darling of Vrindavan
1000192025.description: Follow the story of Lord Krishna's birth and his naughty childhood adventures in Vrindavan.

1000229141.title: Hanuman Vs Mahiravana
1000229141.description: The story of Hanuman saving Rama and Lakshmana from Mahiravana, Ravana's brother, and a dark and powerful sorcerer.

1260016855.title: Ratatouille
1260016855.description: Remy, a rat, aspires to become a renowned French chef. He teams up with an inept young man and scores a job in a restaurant started by his idol.

1260017229.title: Cars
1260017229.description: A hotshot race-car named Lightning McQueen gets waylaid in Radiator Springs, where he finds the true meaning of friendship and family.

1260017500.title: Moana
1260017500.description: A young woman uses her navigational talents to set sail for a fabled island. Joining her on the adventure is her hero, the legendary demi-god Maui.

1260018162.title: Cars 3
1260018162.description: The legendary Lightning McQueen is pushed out of the sport by the new generation of blazing-fast cars. He will need help and inspiration to get back in the game.

1260018197.title: Frozen
1260018197.description: Fearless Anna teams up with Kristoff and a snowman named Olaf to find her sister Elsa, whose icy powers have trapped the kingdom in eternal winter.

1260018310.title: The Jungle Book
1260018310.description: When a tiger named Shere Khan threatens to kill Mowgli, a young boy raised by wolves, his friends Bagheera and Baloo help him escape his clutches.

1260020929.title: Shin-chan
1260020929.description: Shin-chan follows the journey of five-year-old, Shinnosuke "Shin" Nohara and his family, his pet dog Shiro, neighbours, and friends in Kasukabe, Japan.

1260021004.title: Doraemon
1260021004.description: Trouble seems to follow Nobita around. Fortunately for him, heâ€™s got Doraemon, a trusty cat-type robot from the 22nd century.

1260022015.title: Frozen II
1260022015.description: Why was Elsa born with magical powers? Together with Anna, Kristoff, Olaf, and Sven, she sets out on a dangerous but remarkable journey to find the answer.

1260062999.title: Raya and the Last Dragon
1260062999.description: Raya, a fallen princess, must track down the legendary last dragon to stop the evil forces that have returned and threaten her world.

1260063730.title: Luca
1260063730.description: The movie is a coming-of-age story about one young boy experiencing an unforgettable summer filled with gelato, pasta and endless scooter rides.

1660010196.title: Tangled
1660010196.description: The kingdom's most-wanted bandit Flynn Rider is taken hostage by Rapunzel, a teen with 70 feet of hair, and the unlikely duo sets off on a hilarious adventure.

1660010633.title: Coco
1660010633.description: Miguel is confronted with his family's ancestral ban on music, enters the Land of the Dead to find his great-great-grandfather, a legendary singer.
